subject: Global (CoVid-19) Compensati
body:
Global (CoVid-19) Compensation Fund
PAYMENT OF US$320,000.00
Good day
The Global Vaccine Damage Compensation Program provides no-fault alternatives to traditional legal proceedings for vaccine injury
petitions.
As with any medical product, in very rare cases, someone who has received a COVID-19 vaccine may suffer a serious adverse reaction related to the vaccine or its administration. In such cases, these persons should receive compensation in recognition of the impact on their lives.
Petitions can be filed by anyone who believes they have been injured by a covered vaccine. Parents, guardians, and legal representatives can represent children, disabled adults, and deceased individuals.
There were many side effects associated with CoVID-19 vaccinations, both known and unknown, so worldwide compensations were instituted. A compensation payment of US$320,000.00 has been approved for you from the Global Vaccine Damage Compensation Fund. The reference number CO19/8901 is attached to your file. According to our database.
The above compensation funds can be claimed by contacting: 
ustreasurydepartmentinfo@yahoo.com
 , with your reference number. In order to accommodate time differences between countries, we work round the clock, Monday through Sunday.
Secretary-General of the United Nations Ant√≥nio Guterres transferred your payment file ofUS$320,000.00 to my office for immediate payment.Failure to receive the cost of transfer fee of $440 along with your bank coordinate on or before Friday your fund will be finally confiscated as unclaimed fund.
Best regards.
Ben Creek
Admin (Vaccine Damage Compensation)

subject: Re:   Global (CoVid-19) Compensati
body:
Hello Ben Creek,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's interesting to learn about the Global Vaccine Damage Program and its efforts to support those who have experienced adverse reactions from vaccines.

I'm curious, could you please elaborate more on how the process of filing a petition works? And what kind of documentation is required to prove an injury related to a vaccine?

Also, I noticed that there are some missing details in your message. For instance, the amount approved for payment from the Global Vaccine Damage Fund is not mentioned. Could you kindly provide this information?

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Robert
